long_description: A mini pump that works with Presta or Schrader valves, the Topeak Mini Dual DX Pump works well on the road or on the trail. SmartHead(TM) works with both Presta and Schrader valves without swapping heads. Dual-action pumping doubles volume with each stroke and inflates to 120 psi. Handle with soft plastic Kraton grip provides great comfort while pumping. The Topeak Mini Dual DX Pump comes with a side mount bracket.
short_description: A mini pump that works with Presta or Schrader valves, the Topeak Mini Dual DX Pump works well on the road or on the trail.
